mapper.select: select u.username,u.head_img_url,c.* from comment c left join user u on u.id = c.user_id where c.status = 1 and c.novel_id = #{novelId} order by c.up desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select u.username,c.* from comment c left join user u on u.id = c.user_id where c.status = 1 and c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.up desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select u.username,c.* from comment c left join user u on u.id = c.user_id where c.status = 1 and c.parent_id = #{parent_id} order by c.up desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
